divs: Sighting Detailswoodworth louisiana sitting on a public beach in a campground very bright object in sky like it was observing us me and 2 other people thought it was a plane object was stationary then it went dim then pulsated then turned off like a light bulb we were like what was that i said i know what it was this area i have been witness to 3 sightings lost sight of object because it disappeared.
Summary: early morning hours of the 20th of july very bright light in the sky i would say toward the east
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Alexandria
There were no other sightings in Alexandria on or around July 20th 2004
